title: How Do I Create a New Contact or a Fullscreen Caller?
answer:
1.Creating a contact   
 Open People > Add a contact, and select the storage directory. Enter the contact editing interface, enter the contact information, and touch DONE.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924115258614001.png)  ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924115311790001.png)  ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924115325202001.png)  

2. Creating a fullscreen caller (FScaller)

NOTE   
 FScaller is not supported for contacts stored in the SIM card, but is supported for contacts stored in the   
 phone.   
 Method 1: Open People. Click the profile picture of the contact and choose a picture   
 from the gallery or take a photo for the contact.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924115355721001.png)

Method 2: Open the profile of a contact and click the modify button. Click the profile   
 picture of the contact and take a photo or choose a photo from the gallery as the FScaller   
 for the contact.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924115413740001.png)  ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924115426363001.png)
